《后羿射日圖》
箭神后羿將作惡的九個太陽射下，
還民間一個安居樂業的空間，
展現的不但是仁愛，
更是敢於挑戰權威的態度。

敢作。敢為 - 动态度音樂節 2017
Dare To Act - DTD Music Festival 2017

日期 Date: 15th Jan (Sun) 
時間 Time: 中午12pm
地點 Venue: 隆雪華堂 KLSCAH
(The Kuala Lumpur And Selangor Chinese Assembly Hall)

各民族的神話人物都有著追求遠大理想的個性特徵，其超越人類的能力更是人們借助想象力，以體現勇敢征服困難和實踐夢想的精神。

2017 年的《動態度音樂節》取題為《敢作·敢為》，借多位耳熟能詳的中華神話人物作為宣傳元素，去詮釋“勇敢做自己”。

與插圖家 Sugee Wee 攜手合作繪製了 6 幅精彩絕倫，既有古典情懷也穿越了現代元素的插圖作為宣傳海報，重新認識和延伸我們的根源。

#动态度音樂節2017
#敢作敢為
#DongTaiDuMusicFestival2017
#DareToAct

《創意攤位 - 招募》
創意市集已是我們音樂節裡的特色，
亦是節日裡很重要的活動，
聚集了各個創意領域，
眼花撩亂的DIY手作或各項精美產品，
會讓每年的活動氣氛提升。
報名擺攤的速度和買票一樣，
都要快喲，不然滿額了也就錯過了～

::Creative Market - Calling for Vendor::
15th Jan (Sun) 
One of the event for "DTD Music Festival 2017" 
Located at "The Kuala Lumpur And Selangor Chinese Assembly Hall"
Please apply now!

字/Shane 

表格：https://goo.gl/forms/vv5NyDj7FjhcTlhD3

請大家分享出去讓更多人知道，
早鳥票即將售罄，請提前預定。
Please share, Early Bird Ticket sold out soon, Kindly book earlier: 
dongtaidu@gmail.com

We will see you there ~

DongTaiDu Music Festival 2017 - Dare To Act 
动态度音樂節2017 - 敢作。敢為
15/1/2017。隆雪華堂 KLSCAH
門票預定：dongtaidu@gmail.com

《动态度音樂節2017 - 敢作。敢為》
DongTaiDu Music Festival 2017 - Dare To Act

氛圍電子音樂除了純碎聆聽，
亦是感受寧靜和聲音的交融。
音樂響起的那一刻，
凝結思緒，讓靈魂漂浮於當下環境，
空氣，猶如可觸摸的粒子，
呼吸，生命和音樂的節奏。

Euseng Seto + Kent Lee
兩位音樂才子近這幾年的合作火花，
已飄灑各地而且繼續傳播，
相信他們倆的默契現已更為穩固。
一月十五號，音樂節最靜心的時段，
不可錯過的一刻沈澱。

字/Shane

Euseng Seto, as flica, began in 2007. In his embryonic form, flica dabbled in a mishmash of the acoustic and the electronic, composing easy listening melody tunes for debut album Windwane & Window. The release received an overwhelming response from Japan, which resulted in flica’s sophomore, Nocturnal, being released under Tokyo-based indie label Schole. It was during the transitionary period between his sophomore and third album that flica started delving into a darker and emotional ambient sound.

flica專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/flicasound/

data.message:
《动态度音樂節2017 - 敢作。敢為》
DongTaiDu Music Festival 2017 - Dare To Act

終於，
敢作敢為音樂節演出單位公佈完畢，
香港"GDJYB 雞蛋蒸肉"餅壓軸登場!

成立於2012年的香港四人女子獨立樂隊。
成員有主音Soft、結他手Soni、貝斯手YY 和鼓手Hei Hei 。
自稱為算術民謠組合，
以Honglish為創作語言，
曲風平淡溫柔得來有點大風。
曾在香港的Fringe Club、Hidden Agenda、
蒲窩、K11、各大專院校和不同音樂活動演出，
包括香港最大型戶外音樂節Clockenflap。
2014年被Time Out Hong Kong Magazine
選為城中23 New Rising Stars其中之一，
首張EP於同年9月發行，
並在蒲吧舉行發佈會。
2015年5月底為日本獨立樂團tricot香港場擔任開場嘉賓。
7月中首次飛抵台灣嘉義參加《Wake Up 音樂祭》，
並在台北小地方展演空間舉行 《台北小雞蛋演唱會》。

GDJYB is a Hong Kong-based indie math-folk girl band. Formed in August 2012, the group consists of guitarist Soni Cheng, drummer Heihei Ng, vocalist Soft Liu and bassist Yellow Yi Wong. The name

GDJYB is from a local Chinese dish (Gai Dan Jane Yuk Bang, steamed meat loaf with egg). By fusing math-rock and folk music genres in Honglish (Hong Kong English), GDJYB is bringing something distinctive and fresh to the indie music scene through the changing tempos and patterns. The band have been to various music festivals and live houses, like Fringe Club, Hidden Agenda and Clockenflap. In 2014, GDJYB is selected as one of the '23 New Rising Stars in Hong Kong's new music' by Time Out HK Magazine, and released their debut EP in Sep. In July 2015, GDJYB participated in
Taiwan Wake Up Music Festival, and organised their first mini concert in Taipei.

樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/gdjyb/

- - -

巨大的轟鳴 Gigantic Roar再度襲馬，
动态度音樂節2017其中最響的重炮！

來自於港都高雄，
2015 金音創作獎最佳現場演出得主，
台灣近年最佳新銳樂團之一

歌曲融合龐克、藍調、饒舌等曲風，

成軍三年餘已造訪美國、新加坡、
馬來西亞、中國、香港等地。

舞台上奇特的肢體語言、
直白但又令人玩味的歌詞，
於樂迷中建立深刻印象。

新專輯《老子有的是時間》於2016年4月發行。

Foursome rock band from Kaohsiung, Taiwan. They won Golden Indie Music Award for “Best Live Performance” at the end of 2015.

60's psych-jams, funked-up grooves and some garage-punk thrown in for the hell of it!

This young group has made quite a splash over the course of their brief existence. Playing their first gig when they were still high school lads in 2012, they immediately proved themselves to be musically mature beyond their years. This maturity has already allowed them to be invited to every major music festival in Taiwan.

樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/GiganticRoar/

- - -

跟莫札特的最後之作《魔笛》絕無關係，
瘋笛要玩的是隨心所欲的遊戲。
作為一個Duo，
兩人的風格明明就是南轅北轍。
可能是這種不一樣，
兩人又默默的被牽連在一塊，
一塊音樂的拼圖。

FNGDY, Electronic Music Duo,
Come watch them play in DTD Music Fest 2017 ～
15th Jan (Sun) 
Book your Early Bird Ticket now:
dongtaidu@gmail.com

《动态度音樂節2017 - 敢作。敢為》
DongTaiDu Music Festival 2017 - Dare To Act

::Awake阿威克::
主唱Ken的歌唱方法，
是以自修的歌劇式演唱技巧，
配合長期練習，造就富有爆發力的聲線，
為樂團唱出高亢且明亮的歌聲，
也可唱出粗獷且具有磁性的歌聲；
Richardss的結它彈法，
是揉合了藍調和古典樂。
在他獨奏的時候，
以古典樂的感覺帶著藍調樂的吉他指法來彈奏，
帶出新穎的獨奏方式；
Benjamin用了電子樂節奏，
揉合重金屬和放克音樂，
為樂團的音樂性質作出平衡之餘，
也為樂隊製造出更多調皮及輕快的原素；
Jason打鼓的方式偏向重和沉的類型，但不失容易入耳的感覺和節奏。
他運用自成一格的打鼓技巧， 
同時亦能融合樂團的音樂需求。

樂團成員們各自擁有強烈的個人風格，
也都擁有各自豐富的音樂主意和想法，
所以他們現在創作的音樂，
就是將大家不同的音樂概念，揉合在一起，
從中創造出新的音樂風格。

Diversity Modern Rock (多元化現代搖滾)，
Progressive Pop Rock (前衛流行搖滾)，流行金屬等等。 
AWAKE正發展著屬於自己的多元現代搖滾風格。
忠於原創，獨樹一幟，
從來都是"阿威克"堅持的路線。

請加入樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/Awakeband5/

- - -

認識Rozella是通過一位同校老同學，
相隔接近二十載，當時不太熟悉的校友，
因為音樂而讓對方得知更多本地的好音樂，
那是多麼有趣且快樂的事。
來自東馬的Rozella並非民謠創作歌手，
她主要的旋律以慢節奏電音配置完成，
一直以來都是與幾位年輕樂手，
以電子樂團的形式演出。
無巧不成書，
剛發現這次馬來西亞的演出單位，
除了吉隆坡，
也包括了北馬/南馬/東馬各一組，
就是要你感受不同環境的愛與音樂。

字/Shane

Rozella is a singer and songwriter originally from Borneo. She started performing in 2013 in her hometown before moving to Kuala Lumpur mid last year. 
Being a skilled lyricist, Rozella uses music to tell stories that are close  to her heart. Her songs have been featured on the Malaysian English Top 10 Charts and the Borneo English TOP 10 Charts. She was recently nominated for two categories in the 2016 VIMA Music Awards.
Besides regularly performing in different festival and events, Rozella created the soundtrack of two productions by the Green Leaf Theatre House. She also wrote the theme song for two events, ROR Wildlife Festival 2015 and Walk for Autism Sabah 2014/2016. 
In addition to that, Rozella is the founder of a social photography  project called True Complexion. It celebrates diversity and helps raise  awareness about different medical conditions.

請加入樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/rozellamusic/

此"四葉草"非彼"四葉草"
Four Leaf Clover各團員均來自音樂學府，
有了音樂知識的基礎，
然後要如何利用其實蠻重要的。
畢業後和幾位志同道合的同學組了樂團，
玩些獨特及歡愉的歌曲，
相信是他們現在正在做的事。
凱爾特民謠，
一種類似愛爾蘭傳統調子的樂風，
初次聽到他們現場演奏確實為之驚喜，
一種希望分享給大家聽的感覺湧上心頭，
而明年音樂節就是其中最好的機會。
此"四葉草"，
會讓大家的耳朵比眼睛更幸運。

字/Shane

Four Leaf Clover is a band in Kuala Lumpur made up of five individuals with various musical backgrounds. Their adaptability enables them to perform not only covers of traditional reels and jigs but also adding their own zest into popular modern songs such as Led Zeppelin and game soundtracks. 
Their sound is mainly based on Celtic folk music infused with dynamic flavours of samba, rock and country, as well as local Malaysian folk. 
The band consists of tin whistler/vocalist/melodican Simmy, violinist Jonathan Khor, guitarist Jonathan Wong, bassist Ian Linga and cajon player Ashley. 

請加入樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/fourleafcloverband/

《勇敢做自己 | Stay True.Stay You》
聽看變胎 BandTai貝斯手"原"的音樂故事。
配合這屆动态度音樂節主題"敢作。敢為"
製作了"勇敢做自己"系列宣傳片，
以有參與音樂節的樂團樂手，
去說說他們少為人知的音樂經歷。

"Stay True.Stay You" series promo video,
For DTD Music Festival 2017 ～
The Music Journey from "BandTai" bassist "Yuan"

從Neuyabe開始，
我們認識紫嫣已有很長的一段時間，
彷彿是近年才真正感受到，
她獨立出發後的堅韌態度。
即使輕聲柔唱已是她的特色，
但歌曲背後涵蓋的正面能量，
已有足夠的力度去傳遞她想要表達的訊息。
音樂節當天，讓我們洗耳恭聽她的歌 ～

字/Shane

Ziyan Tung believes that love should flow unconstrained and that an open mind frees us from being stuck in old, damaging beliefs. She believes that music has this power to change and heal. Music is a combination of logic and passion, the most natural way to open hearts and minds. Music is also infectious, and so is the perfect way to carry and spread messages of hope, encouragement and love.

請加入她的專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/ziyan.tung.ziyan/

近期現場演出的"磁力王"，
非mutesite莫屬!
吸引的並非只有觀眾群，
還有每位個體的情緒和慾望，
能將覆蓋著的靈魂內在慢慢挑逗出來，
通過他們慣性的氣氛帶動，
將現場推至高潮。
一月十五號，讓他們的音樂把大家給弄濕!

字/Shane

Formed in August 2014, mutesite is a collective experimenting through the cracks of instrumental music. Their composition invigorates a nuanced disposition, translating through the aesthetics between mixture of post-rock and math-rock. 
The beauty of instrumental music is that there is no fixed definition. Every listener paints a different imagination to the songs, thus creating limitless boundaries. 

請加入樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/mutesite/

2016年，孬乐队全體大躍進！
完成了各類別的演出，
包括國外音樂節，國內外巡演，
專場及混合演出，
有時不能不佩服他們持之以恆的毅力。
在音樂作品上，亦從來沒讓大家失望過，
("失望"二字已過時了)
今年大家聽到的好幾首新歌，
證明他們已越過了歲月摧殘，
依舊"不安份"的甭循規蹈矩，精緻且耐聽。
我們，都一直等待再看孬的演出，
一直等待。

字/Shane

NAO's musical form developed from the design theory, with math-like equation rhythm, encompasses a mixture of joyous melodies yet mix with psychedelic atmosphere. we are as complicated as a "human being" ...... Influenced by Japan’s rich musical expression, it’s said to be the most beautiful manifestation of a diverse mix. With a decade of music history, it’s one of the few Malaysian bands across multiple music scenes. Having done numerous overseas tours and performances, its music has transformed from rage to peculiarly interesting and lively; focusing on creative and joyous absolute music as its musical blueprint.

請加入樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/isnao.likepage/

檳城迷幻金屬樂團WHITE CROW參戰!
自"灰色地帶"解散後，
吉他手另起爐灶，組成了這組"白色烏鴉"，
當得知他們已準備就緒，
亦知道是時候將"懷念"放置一旁，
此刻在我們面前的這個新組合，
才是真實的。

字/Shane

White Crow is a concept of contradictions among sanity, morality, religions or the whole 'meaning' of humanity.
We place our selves in the perspective of the crow looking back at mankind, and cursing their intelligence. 

請加入樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/whitecrow111/

data.story: Jun Nv shared 动态度 dongtaidu's event to the event: 动态度音樂節 2017 - 敢作。敢為 | DongTaiDu Music Festival 2017 - Dare To Act.

data.message:
《动态度音樂節2017 - 敢作。敢為》
DongTaiDu Music Festival 2017 - Dare To Act

這一次，
我們來感受Tinnitux 耳鸣乐队的突飛猛進。
離上屆音樂節至今不到一年的時間，
經過不斷的排練，
明顯能察覺樂團已漸漸進入狀態，
一種舞台上投入和釋放的能量，
逐漸圍繞著他們的演出。
相信隨著專輯的即將發行，
明年於音樂節的演出將更為賣力。
如今才是正式的開始，
接下來，他們還有更漫長的路要走，
我們，拭目以待。

字/Shane

"Voice of the decadency, as one of the most frequent understandings on Rock and Roll where it doesn’t really serve the purpose to compliment, nor even to renounce its obscenity.
Though presenting a false, fallen and obscure truth is the true hypocrisy.
Tinnitux is just who we are. New, young yet inspired by the pioneers, and its passion. We think, and rethink under the new thoughts and the conservative’s one, expressing it by using the most basic: heavily distorted guitar voice, hard, thick bass and dynamic beats with the dreamy vocal, which lead to a surreal soundscape, like a heavy object flowing like a feather, only existing in parallel serene space.
We can be a breathtaking guitar’s fuzz, or an echo from the distorted amps, or signs before we enter the dream, or even the noises while time machine is getting ready, to be precise,
we also fit to say we are the noises of the decadency of the time." - Tinnitux 

請加入樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/tinnituxband/

The Analog Girl
What started out as a lo-fi bedroom project using portable synthesizers and cassette tape recorders has since evolved into some kind of dreamlike technicolour pop universe - one in which Singaporean musician The Analog Girl creates and performs using a myriad of illuminating electronic instruments including the Tenori-On, Monome and Percussa AudioCubes. Named by TIME magazine as one of 5 Music Acts To Watch in 2008, The Analog Girl has had audiences worldwide plugged into her sound at a spectrum of venues and festivals including CMJ Music Festival in New York, famed British photographer Nick Knight’s SHOWstudio in London, Worldtronics Festival at the Haus der Kulturen der Welt in Berlin, the Cirque Electrique in Paris, Superdeluxe in Tokyo and Mosaic Music Weekend in Singapore. And a new album is slated for an end 2016 release.

紐約/倫敦/柏林/巴黎/日本
新加坡The Analog Girl的魅力。
动态度剛成立不久，
忘記在什麼情形之下聊音樂的時候，
曾聊到這位厲害的女生，
以她當時的年齡，
能創制出那樣的電音篇章而為之驚訝。
前幾年Spotify横行再完整聽了她的專輯，
每首聽似平板電腦音樂但當中表露的概念，
會得知這女生的音樂觸覺與品味，
有著非一般的深度，同時也解釋了，
她的音樂為何能得到那麼多國家的青睞。

字/Shane

樂團專頁:
https://www.facebook.com/theanaloggirl/
